import React, { useState } from 'react' import styles from '../styles/popap.module.scss' import { Close } from '../assets/icon/Close' import { Input } from './Input' import { Button } from './Button' export const Popap = ({ type, onCloase, productName, productPrice, onClick }) => { const [name, setName] = useState(productName) const [price, setPrice] = useState(productPrice) const onChangeName = (event) => { setName(event.target.value) } return (
) }
